parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3dev
</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>2.03

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Sounds

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Causes a smooth change in the master volume of the environment and is different from [[enableEnvironment]] global mute option. The change duration is given by time, the target volume by volume. The default volume is 1.0.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> time '''fadeEnvironment''' volume

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> time: [[Number]] - fade interval in seconds

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> volume: [[Number]] - speech volume range 0 to 1. Maximum volume is 1. Default is 1.

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>5 [[fadeEnvironment]] 0.1;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[environmentVolume]], [[fadeSpeech]], [[fadeRadio]], [[fadeSound]], [[fadeMusic]], [[soundVolume]], [[musicVolume]], [[radioVolume]], [[speechVolume]], [[enableEnvironment]], [[environmentEnabled]]
</value></part></template>


[[Category:Scripting Commands|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template></root>
